AttackerCapabilities: Ability to manipulate network requests using BurpSuite

Vulnerabilities: Improper access control allowing password change mutation

Steps.Description: The attacker discovers the GraphQL endpoint and realizes that it accepts an introspection query

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that they can obtain sensitive information about the application's schema by sending an introspection query
StepDetails.Action: The attacker goes to https://ivangoncharov.github.io/graphql-voyager/ and obtains the introspection query
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully obtains the introspection query to their clipboard

Steps.Description: The attacker sends the introspection query to the GraphQL endpoint

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that by sending the introspection query to the GraphQL endpoint, they will receive the full introspection result
StepDetails.Action: The attacker uses BurpSuite's repeater tab to send the introspection query to the /graphql endpoint
StepDetails.Result: The attacker receives the full introspection result as expected

Steps.Description: The attacker analyzes the introspection result using the GraphQL Voyager tool

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that analyzing the introspection result using the GraphQL Voyager tool will provide insights into the functionality and structure of the GraphQL endpoint
StepDetails.Action: The attacker pastes the introspection result into the GraphQL Voyager tool
StepDetails.Result: The attacker gains a good sense of the data built into the GraphQL endpoint

Steps.Description: The attacker identifies the UpdatePassword mutation as a potential vulnerability

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the UpdatePassword mutation could be a vulnerability that allows them to change a user's password
StepDetails.Action: The attacker examines the available mutations in the introspection result and identifies the UpdatePassword mutation
StepDetails.Result: The attacker confirms the presence of the UpdatePassword mutation

Steps.Description: The attacker constructs a request to update the admin password

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that by constructing a request to update the admin password, they can gain unauthorized access
StepDetails.Action: The attacker uses the content of the login GraphQL request as a reference to construct a request to update the admin password
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully constructs a request to update the admin password

Steps.Description: The attacker updates the admin password

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that by updating the admin password with a new password, they can gain unauthorized access to the admin account
StepDetails.Action: The attacker sends the request to update the admin password with a new password
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully updates the admin password

Steps.Description: The attacker logs in with the admin account and new password

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that by logging in with the admin account and new password, they can access privileged information
StepDetails.Action: The attacker logs in using the admin account and the new password
